sentences.en: Carbon steels exist in three stable crystalline phases.
sentences.cn: 碳素钢含有3种稳定的结晶状态.

sentences.en: Does life exist on Mars?
sentences.cn: 火星上有生命吗?

sentences.en: Does life exist on other planets?
sentences.cn: 其他行星上有生命吗？

sentences.en: For all practical purposes the treaty has already ceased to exist.
sentences.cn: 实际上协议已经不复存在。

sentences.en: Good and evil may co-exist within one family.
sentences.cn: 善与恶可能并存于一体。

sentences.en: He is always imagining dangers that don't exist.
sentences.cn: 他总是想着那些其实并不存在的危险.

sentences.en: He thought that if he couldn't see something, it didn't exist.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己看不见的东西就不存在。

sentences.en: I would have to learn, little by little, to exist alone.
sentences.cn: 我得慢慢学会独自生活。

sentences.en: It is possible that such cases exist.
sentences.cn: 盖有之矣.

sentences.en: Machines now exist to pack olives in jars.
sentences.cn: 现在可用机器将橄榄装进罐子里。

sentences.en: Many of the groups exist in name only.
sentences.cn: 许多团体实际上是有名无实。

sentences.en: Many possible orderings may exist.
sentences.cn: 组合方式可能有许多种。

sentences.en: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.cn: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.en: Problems also exist in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 农业也存在着一些问题.

sentences.en: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.cn: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.en: Such people do not exist.
sentences.cn: 这样的人是不存在的.

sentences.en: The club will cease to exist if financial help is not found.
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部要是得不到资助将不复存在。

sentences.en: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.cn: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.en: The hostages existed on bread and water.
sentences.cn: 人质靠面包和水生存。

sentences.en: There exist many sources of energy both potential and kinetic.
sentences.cn: 存在着许多势能和动能的能源.

sentences.en: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.cn: 我们靠吃大米过活。

words.tran_cn: 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的
存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物

phrases.tran_cn: 以…形式(或形态)存在，作为…而存在，

trans.tran_en: to happen or be present in a particular situation or place
to happen or be present in a particular situation or place
